articles.description: The CEO and governing board vice-chairman of Intermountain Cedar City Hospital wrote an open letter to their community, imploring them to follow social distancing and mask requirements to help stop the spread of COVID-19.  LynAnn Imlay and Eric Parker say fol…

articles.title: Oakland County announces new drive-thru COVID-19 testing locations - WXYZ
articles.description: Oakland County is relocating drive-thru COVID-19 testing locations beginning Nov. 30 to provide shelter from winter weather.
articles.content:
OAKLAND COUNTY, Mich. (WXYZ) Oakland County is relocating drive-thru COVID-19 testing locations beginning Nov. 30 to provide shelter from winter weather.
